Hola Queridos Miembros!

Normalmente no promociono eventos no propuestos por nuestros organizadores, pero hoy estoy haciendo una excepcion porque me parece tan en linea con lo que les podria interesar a ustedes, y el maestro es un buen amigo del meetup (y tambien el director del Boston Latino International Film Festival).

Jose Barriga esta dando un curso en el Cambridge Center for Adult Education con el titulo "

"Latin American and Latino (U.S.) Culture Through Short Films"

Aqui tienes la descripcion: We'll study 20th-century Latin America and U.S. Latino culture through short movies, taking into account the historical and cultural background of a very diverse community that represents 16 percent of the U.S. population and 19 countries. We'll view one to two shorts per class and have critical conversations to carry out a comparative analysis of films from both Latin America and the U.S. The class is conducted in Spanish; mid- to advanced-level Spanish is required. Limited to 16.

Sec. 01: 8 Wednesdays, 8:00-9:45 pm. Begins Jan. 16, 56 Brattle St. | $188
